title: Denali
description: Denali, the loving brother and uncle in the Neveah series has a story of his own. When you met him in Neveah A Broken Forever he was a brother hell bent on first saving his sister and then his land. A loyal man to a fault with strong family ties and pride. Meet Denali before he was forced to become a man in search of vengeance for his sister. The innocent boy that fell in love with an innocent girl just before he was forced to become a man and put his life on hold. Begin the story of Neveah from Denali's point of view.
author: Angie Merriam
